name: marksense
description: A beautiful Notion-like Markdown editor for VS Code, powered by Tiptap — with AI assistance, slash commands, and rich formatting

walkthroughs.title: Getting Started with Marksense
walkthroughs.description: Learn how to edit Markdown files in a rich, Notion-like editor.

steps.title: Open a Markdown File
steps.description: Open any ``.md`` file in your workspace to get started.

media.markdown: Open a ``.md`` file from the Explorer sidebar or via **File → Open File**.

steps.title: Enable Marksense Editor
steps.description:
Right-click the editor tab and choose **Reopen Editor With… → Marksense Editor**.

[Open a Markdown file](command:workbench.action.quickOpen?%5B%22*.md%22%5D)

media.markdown: Right-click the editor tab → **Reopen Editor With…** → **Marksense Editor**.

steps.title: Make Marksense the Default Editor
steps.description:
To always open ``.md`` files with Marksense, add this to your settings:
```json
"workbench.editorAssociations": {
  "*.md": "marksense.editor"
}
```

[Open Settings (JSON)](command:workbench.action.openSettingsJson)

media.markdown: Right-click the tab → **Reopen Editor With…** → **Marksense Editor** → click **Configure default editor for '*.md'…** at the bottom of the picker.

steps.title: Enable AI Features (Optional)
steps.description:
Autocorrect and predictions work offline by default. For cloud-based grammar correction, add a [Typewise](https://www.typewise.app) API token. You can also switch to cloud-first mode via the **AI Provider** setting.

Contact [apikey@typewise.app](mailto:apikey@typewise.app) to get a key, then paste it in settings.

[Open Marksense Settings](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%5B%22marksense%22%5D)

media.markdown: Local models handle spell-check and predictions out of the box. Add an API token for grammar correction, or switch **AI Provider** to `apiPreferred` for cloud-first AI.

enumDescriptions: Use local models when available, fall back to API if a token is set
Use Typewise cloud API when a token is set, fall back to local models
Only use local models — no network calls for corrections or predictions
marksense.aiProvider.description: Controls whether spell-check and predictions use local models (offline) or the Typewise cloud API.
marksense.aiProvider.markdownDescription:
Controls whether spell-check and predictions use **local models** (offline, WASM-based) or the **Typewise cloud API**.

- `offlinePreferred` — Local models first, API fallback
- `apiPreferred` — Cloud API first (requires token), local fallback
- `offlineOnly` — No network calls at all (grammar correction disabled)

marksense.typewiseToken.description: Typewise API token for cloud-based autocorrect, grammar correction, and sentence completion. Required when AI Provider is set to apiPreferred. Contact apikey@typewise.app to get a key.
marksense.typewiseToken.markdownDescription: API token for [Typewise](https://www.typewise.app) cloud-based autocorrect, grammar correction, and sentence completion. Required when **AI Provider** is set to `apiPreferred`. To get an API key, contact [apikey@typewise.app](mailto:apikey@typewise.app).

marksense.autoSaveDelay.description: Debounce delay in milliseconds before syncing edits to the file
marksense.autoSaveDelay.markdownDescription: Debounce delay in **milliseconds** before syncing edits to the file. Every edit auto-saves after this delay. Range: `100`–`5000` ms.

marksense.defaultFullWidth.description: Open files in wide layout by default. Can still be toggled per file using the width button in the toolbar.
marksense.defaultFullWidth.markdownDescription: Open files in **wide layout** by default. Can still be toggled per file using the width button in the toolbar.
